content:
DAV Property URL Scheme - Namespace (Cont’d)

  • Issue of Readability

    • Refering to the http://www.ietf.org/standards/dav/source property on http://foo turns into: http://foo;DAV/http:%2F%2Fwww.ietf.org%2Fstandards%2Fdav%2Fsource. The encoding is necessary to prevent the slashes in the property name from being mistaken for slashes in the param space.
    • Most users can neither read nor write this.
